snippet: BROMBERG--Myron J.,Esq. Our sympathy to Lisa, his devoted wife, Ken, Eric and Bruce. Best friend for 78 years from Passaic to Yale and forever after. Roma, Bob, Janice and Irma 1/3
lead_paragraph: BROMBERG--Myron J.,Esq. Our sympathy to Lisa, his devoted wife, Ken, Eric and Bruce. Best friend for 78 years from Passaic to Yale and forever after. Roma, Bob, Janice and Irma 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BROMBERG, MYRON J.
